articles.title: Highlights - RC Toulon vs. Saracens - Semi-finals | Challenge Cup Rugby 2021/22 - Heineken Champions Cup & EPCR Challenge Cup
articles.description: RC Toulon set up an EPCR Challenge Cup final against fellow TOP 14 side Lyon as two tries from Gabin Villière helped them to a 25-16 victory over Saracens at...
